on reading compounds: 残滓【ザンシ】remains, dregs, vestiges, remnant, residue
残滓【ザンシ】remains, dregs, vestiges, remnant, residue
kun reading compounds: 滓【かす】dregs, sediment, grounds, meal, lees (esp. sake), leftovers, by-product, worthless item, junk, dregs (e.g. of society), scum, dross, card only worth 1 point (in hanafuda)
糟酢【かすず】vinegar made from sake lees
